description: Detects the use of the Dinject PowerShell cradle based on the specific flags
name: DInject PowerShell Cradle CommandLine Flags
query: (process.command_line:(*\ \/am51* OR *\ \/password*) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:*\ \/PASSWORDCHG* OR process.parent.executable:("C\:\\Program\ Files\\CEETIS\\CEETIS_IDE.exe" OR "C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\CEETIS\\CEETIS_IDE.exe")))))
author: Florian Roth
